channel.title: Okay Soo King Meta Is Gone But Now
channel.description:
Okay soo king meta is gone but it's really annoying when you now have a new whisper prince meta
So imo it should be fixed like how the king meta was fixed since it's just as annoying as the king meta

item.title: Okay Soo King Meta Is Gone But Now
item.dc:creator: Htm
item.description:
Twil1ight:

Soooo you’re basically suggesting to make a Prince convertable counterpart or he can be good or evil from the start (66/33%). Maybe it’s just me but without ANY confirmed BD in a game, it would made a situation, when some people will gonna backstab each other more often than now.If you ever saw a BD loss because of solo EK then you know to what I referring.

Well I’m not… I mean it should be fixed sorry if it was unclear

also if prince would have the same system as king then I’d nerf it a bit

Also what should we call him? I’m just gonna call him Duke

Nerfs:
Evil King can’t spawn with him
Sorc can’t spawn with him
Unseen will start with 1 member who won’t be notified who the Duke is
Duke can’t kill

Read full topic
item.source: Okay Soo King Meta Is Gone But Now

item.source: Okay Soo King Meta Is Gone But Now

item.title: Okay Soo King Meta Is Gone But Now
item.dc:creator: Alice
item.description:
Seconded. Is the target NMU? Could be the Sorc who used her Magic Cloak. Is the target MU? Could be NMU while the Sorc used Magic Dust. At this point the only thing I’ve seen Inqs do right now is either kill a few BDs with Ruthless Efficiency and then die or win because BD found the Sorc on their own. At this rate I’m surprised that the meta hasn’t changed to exe every Inq claim on sight.

Read full topic
item.source: Okay Soo King Meta Is Gone But Now

item.title: Okay Soo King Meta Is Gone But Now
item.dc:creator: Vandalay
item.description:
NightX:

Then they’ll just get insta killed by the Inquisitor when they find magic.

Honestly… I’d take that over the current setup anyway. I mean if inq is going to exist anyway. No class in the game has as blatently worthless results as the inq. A princess that just blanket assumes all killer/offensive’s are the NK would have a higher accuracy rating than an inq as it is right now… which wouldn’t be such a big deal… IF that weren’t the inq’s one frickin job.

Read full topic
item.source: Okay Soo King Meta Is Gone But Now

item.title: Okay Soo King Meta Is Gone But Now
item.dc:creator: Grizzfang
item.description:
NKs are the answer to this. Sorc is an insane hard counter, just circle the prince and ppl die. As poss you counter knights on prince cuz you can throw ppl into the prince. Reaper can bypass heals and silence the prince so they can’t get any info that day.
